articles.title: Webinar: implementation of HIV testing services by lay providers – the challenge of human resources and quality assurance - World Health Organization
articles.description: Special webinar to present the operational and technical challenges of implementing HIV testing services (HTS) by lay providers, with a specific focus on human resources and quality assurance in sub-Saharan Africa.
